block.p: * LCA Entertainment, the domestic licensing arm of Warner Brothers Worldwide Merchandising, and DC Comics Inc. have entered into a licensing agreement with Signal Apparel Co., Chattanooga, Tenn., and the Shirt Shed Inc., Wabash, Ind., regarding the coming sequel to the motion picture "Batman." Under terms of the agreement, Signal and the Shirt Shed will have an exclusive license to make and sell several categories of casual apparel emblazoned with the logo and characters from the motion picture, as well as with characters DC's "Batman" comic books and an animated television show from Warner based on the same subject.
